title: The Drug Approval Process
description: The Administrative Conference of the United States held a conference on the drug approval process. Speakers, including Dr Frank Young Food and Drug Administration Commissioner, offered suggestions to improve the drug approval process. Members of the audience asked questions of the assembled panelists.
